metadata.title: CVE-2019-10143 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** It was discovered freeradius up to and including version3.0.19 does not correctly configure logrotate, allowing a local attackerwho already has control of the radiusd user to escalate his privileges toroot, by tricking logrotate into writing a radiusd-writable file to adirectory normally inaccessible by the radiusd user. NOTE: the upstreamsoftware maintainer has stated "there is simply no way for anyone to gainprivileges through this alleged issue."

criterions.comment: freeradius package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
